description.brief: The ultimate trial for those who have achieved SS designation - a test of whether a mortal soul can temporarily transcend its limitations and touch the cosmic truth.
description.detailed: Reserved exclusively for those who have reached the pinnacle of mortal achievement - level 100 with SS designation - this trial represents the final boundary between mortal existence and cosmic consciousness. The trial can only be attempted by those who have mastered all six divine traditions and achieved cosmic heritage awakening. It is said that Yggdrasil itself judges whether a soul is ready for this ultimate test, and many who attempt it find themselves transformed in ways they never expected. Success grants not just power, but a permanent change in one's relationship with reality itself.

narrative.prerequisites_lore: Ancient texts speak of mortals who achieved such perfect harmony with the cosmic forces that they briefly transcended the limitations of their mortal forms. These individuals, known as Cosmic Transcendents, gained the ability to perceive and influence the fundamental structures of reality.
narrative.consequences: Those who complete the trial are forever changed. They retain their mortal forms but gain cosmic perspective that allows them to see the true connections between all things. Their actions carry greater weight in the cosmic balance, and they become living bridges between the mortal and divine realms.
